tasks.label: OpenClaw: config (isolated debug gateway)
tasks.command: set -euo pipefail; export OPENCLAW_STATE_DIR="${env:HOME}/.openclaw-debug"; export OPENCLAW_CONFIG_PATH="${env:HOME}/.openclaw-debug/openclaw.json"; mkdir -p "$OPENCLAW_STATE_DIR"; if [ ! -f "$OPENCLAW_CONFIG_PATH" ]; then echo '{}' > "$OPENCLAW_CONFIG_PATH"; fi; mkdir -p "${env:HOME}/.openclaw-debug/agents/main/agent"; if [ -f "${env:HOME}/.openclaw/agents/main/agent/auth-profiles.json" ]; then cp -f "${env:HOME}/.openclaw/agents/main/agent/auth-profiles.json" "${env:HOME}/.openclaw-debug/agents/main/agent/auth-profiles.json"; chmod 600 "${env:HOME}/.openclaw-debug/agents/main/agent/auth-profiles.json" || true; fi; corepack pnpm openclaw config set gateway.mode local && corepack pnpm openclaw config set gateway.bind loopback && corepack pnpm openclaw config set gateway.port 18790 && corepack pnpm openclaw config set gateway.auth.mode token && corepack pnpm openclaw config set gateway.auth.token 35f089832893ed4e64c959e4a68644254743d7770e783ebb && corepack pnpm openclaw config set gateway.controlUi.enabled true && corepack pnpm openclaw config set gateway.controlUi.basePath /openclaw && corepack pnpm openclaw config set gateway.controlUi.root "${workspaceFolder:openclaw}/dist/control-ui" && corepack pnpm openclaw config set logging.level debug && corepack pnpm openclaw config set logging.consoleLevel debug && corepack pnpm openclaw config set logging.consoleStyle compact
